title: Looking for Sans Serif (text) to use with "Minimum" typeface
content:
Hi everyone,

I'm looking for sans serif typeface to accomplice the Minimum Bong typeface by Pierre di Sciullo (link)

[https://www.fontfont.com/fonts/minimum/bong-medium](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425042934/https:/www.fontfont.com/fonts/minimum/bong-medium "https://www.fontfont.com/fonts/minimum/bong-medium")

Been trying out only the selected few sans serifs i have but they don't quite work, so i'm looking to buy a new typeface for this project, all suggestions are more than welcome and as always, all help is appreciated.

E
author: Evie

comments.content: Depending on length of text and subject matter, maybe something like Pill Gothic ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425042934/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/betatype/pill-gothic/")) could work. Or, in any case, something monolinear, geometric, with strong diagonals in the joints of |b|, |d|, |h|, |n|, etc.

Thank you for replying riccard0

The Minimum typeface was used for the logo, the sans serif typeface i'm looking to buy is just going to be used for the address of the company and to spell out the name of the company next to the actual logo.

some other suggestions than Pill Gothic anyone (don't quite like it to be honest) :-D
Then maybe a geometric sans with circle-like |O|, set in all caps, could work.

Maybe something like [Francker](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425042934/http:/www.linotype.com/de/732189/Francker-family.html) or [Akko](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425042934/http:/www.linotype.com/de/793116/Akko-family.html).  
This could also be worth a try: [Quitador](http://web.archive.org/web/20150425042934/http:/www.linotype.com/de/7585/quitador.html).
